item.description:
Lee Moody, New England Business Development Manager from Mohawk Fine
Papers and Joanne Lucey, Specification Business Manager from Unisource
will tag team to get you up to speed on the paper industry.

* Enjoy a free breakfast buffet while you learn about resources
available to designers, market trends and environmental initiatives

* Key discussion will be how to maintain paper quality for your
clients in these difficult economic times without cutting corners

* Paper samples, give- aways and a raffle will be provided.


Breakfast buffet & networking at 8:30 - 1 hr presentation follows
starting around 9:00.



This program is free and open to all designers and specifiers of paper.


Please RSVP by February 4th to: Lee Moody: lee.Moody@mohawkpaper.com

PH: 203-232-3494

In the event of inclement weather, please check your email for notification - or you can call Lee Moody.

group.name: Independent Creative Club of Greater Hartford

item.name: Mohawk & Unisource: The scoop on paper
